name: Saiga-410 box magazine
description: A removable plastic magazine for the Saiga-410 shotgun.  Holds 10 rounds of .410 bore shotshells.

name: Saiga-410 drum magazine
description: A removable plastic magazine for the Saiga-410 shotgun.  Holds 30 rounds of .410 bore shotshells.

name: AF2011A1 magazine
description: A weird-looking magazine; essentially two M1911 magazines joined at the foot.  Each holds 8 cartridges.

name: M1991 .38 Super magazine
description: A steel 9-round magazine for the M1991.
